log_level.name: Log Level
log_level.description: Minimum log level (trace, debug, information, warning, error, or critical; default=information)

mqtt_host.name: MQTT Host
mqtt_host.description: Optional host of the MQTT broker. If you use the mosquitto addon, this will be discovered automatically. An MQTT broker is required for apps that use the Entity Management API.

mqtt_port.name: MQTT Port
mqtt_port.description: Optional port of the MQTT broker. If you use the mosquitto addon, this will be discovered automatically. (default=1883)

mqtt_username.name: MQTT Username
mqtt_username.description: Optional username for the MQTT broker. If you use the mosquitto addon, this will be discovered automatically.

mqtt_password.name: MQTT Password
mqtt_password.description: Optional password for the MQTT broker. If you use the mosquitto addon, this will be discovered automatically.

mqtt_discovery_prefix.name: MQTT Discovery Prefix
mqtt_discovery_prefix.description: Prefix for Home Assistant's MQTT integration. (default=homeassistant)

mqtt_use_tls.name: MQTT Use TLS
mqtt_use_tls.description: Whether or not to use TLS for the MQTT connection. (default=false)

mqtt_allow_untrusted_certificates.name: MQTT Allow untrusted certificates
mqtt_allow_untrusted_certificates.description: If Use TLS is true, this will bypass certificate validation and allow untrusted certificates. (default=false)
